mapper.select: SELECT MB.seq AS MBseq ,MB.id AS MBid ,MB.password AS MBpassword ,MB.name AS MBname ,MB.gender AS MBgender ,MB.dob AS MBdob ,MB.mobile AS MBmobile ,MB.email AS MBemail ,MB.regDate AS MBregDate ,MB.grade AS MBgrade FROM member MB WHERE 1=1 AND MB.delYn = 0 ORDER BY MB.seq DESC

SELECT MB.seq AS MBseq ,MB.id AS MBid ,MB.password AS MBpassword ,MB.name AS MBname ,MB.gender AS MBgender ,MB.dob AS MBdob ,MB.mobile AS MBmobile ,MB.email AS MBemail ,MB.regDate AS MBregDate ,MB.grade AS MBgrade FROM member MB WHERE 1=1 AND MB.delYn = 0 AND MB.seq = #{MBseq} OR MB.id = #{MBid} ORDER BY MB.seq DESC
